name: Hyper Strike
description:
The faster you're going, the more knockback and damage you'll do!

Supports 2 on keyboard, GameCube controllers, JoyCons, and Xbox Controllers (theortically on the last one).

Controls:

  • Keyboard 1
    • Jump: C
    • Dash: V
    • Attack: B
    • Move:  WASD
  • Keyboard 2
    • Jump: I
    • Dash: O
    • Attack: P
    • Move: Arrow Keys
  • GameCube (might be wrong)
    • Jump: A
    • Dash: L or Y
    • Attack: B
    • Move: Analog
  • JoyCon (single, sideways)
    • Jump: Bottom
    • Dash: L or Top
    • Attack: Left
    • Move: Analog
  • Xbox
    • idk
